name: Sanguine Modules
author: Bloodbat
description: Monster modules for your everyday needs.

modules.name: Hydra
modules.description: An 8 to 1 switch/sequencer that can avoid consecutive random repeated values; can be one shot, and can be reset to either no step value or the first step.

modules.name: Gegenees
modules.description: A 1 to 8 switch/sequencer that can avoid consecutive random repeated values; can be one shot, and can be reset to either no step value or the first step.

modules.name: Sanguine Monsters Blank
modules.description: Put a vampire and the Monsters logo on your rack!

modules.name: Dolly-X
modules.description: Dual monophonic to polyphonic channel cloner.

modules.name: Oraculus
modules.description: n to 1 switch/sequencer that takes a polyphonic cable input.

modules.name: Raiju
modules.description: A flexible, fixed voltage source that can clone its output up to 16 channels and has one channel with a single copy of every selected voltage.

modules.name: Sphinx
modules.description: An euclidean sequencer with different modes.

modules.name: Brainz
modules.description: A master control center intended to make synchronizing audio and video files from different recorders easier.

modules.name: Bukavac
modules.description: A noise generator with a plethora of colors... and Perlin

modules.name: Dungeon
modules.description: A sample and hold, track and hold, hold and track and white noise source.

modules.name: Kitsune
modules.description: Attenuate; invert, and offset up to 4 voltages

modules.name: Oubliette
modules.description: A null sink and cable holder for your input and output wires. Also works as a null voltage source.

modules.name: Medusa
modules.description: A normalled, polyphonic mega multiple with 32 inputs and outputs

modules.name: Aion
modules.description: Four counters that can be advanced by triggers or their internal clock

modules.name: Alchemist
modules.description: Mix up to 16 channels from a polyphonic cable to a single monophonic output or a mixed polyphonic cable

modules.name: Alembic
modules.description: An expander for Alchemist providing gain CV control for every channel and individual post-fader channel outputs
